START:
We are happy to count you among our users😉. Press **/options** to display options.
To know how the bot works, press **/help** (**Read before you start**).

NB: The bot is no longer maintained since 05/09/2020
WEB:
Tip:
**For web search🌍, it's very simple, just pretend you're on Google** 😃
If you find errors, don't worry web search will soon be improved.
IMAGE:
Tip:
**For picture search, write the picture📸 name followed by the number of pictures you want.**
NB: The number of picture must be **less than or equal to 15**.
AUDIO:
Tip:
**To download the audio of a Facebook video, Youtube, TikTok etc... ([list of supported websites](https://ytdl-org.github.io/youtube-dl/supportedsites.html)) you just need to paste the 🔗link of the video** 😉
VIDEO:
Tip:
**To download the video of a Facebook, Youtube, TikTok etc... ([list of supported websites](https://ytdl-org.github.io/youtube-dl/supportedsites.html)), you just need to paste the 🔗link of the video** 😉
METEO:
Tip:
**To get the weather⛈ forecast of a city, just write the name of the city🗺**.
__It's cool no__🤗
END:
Thanks for using our service 😉.
To display options, press **/options**

NB: The bot is no longer maintained since 05/09/2020
TIPS: You are already in a conversation, to end it press **/end** before you can choose other options. For help press **/help**.
OTHER: To end a conversation on **/end** before clicking on **/options** to choose other options. For help, press **/help**.
END_CONV:
To end the conversation and choose another option, press **/end**.

NB: The bot is no longer maintained since 05/09/2020.
TIMEOUT:
The conversation is over!

To view options press **/options**..

NB: The bot is no longer maintained since 05/09/2020.
